name.description: The name of the cloud function (e.g. my-cloud-function).

uid.description: The unique identifier of the cloud function (e.g. my-cloud-function).

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

handler.description: The method in the function code that processes events. When invoked, Lambda runs this handler method with event data and context until it returns a response, exits, or times out.

layers.description: The list of cloud function layers that contain supplementary code or data.

runtime.description: The cloud function language-specific environment (e.g. Node.js, Python,Java, Ruby).

security_groups.description: Array of security groups associated with the cloud function.

subnet_info_list.description: The details about subnets associated with the cloud function (e.g. ["subnet-071f712345678e7c8", "subnet-07fd123456788a036"]).

user.description: Details about the IAM entity (user/role) that grants the cloud_function permission to access services and resources.

vpc_uid.description: The unique identifier of the Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) if the cloud function is in a VPC.
